ygData.subject: Ack!  These songs do nothing TOO!?
ygData.msgSnippet: So, on looking over the new song descriptions at EQVault, saw how the author continuously pointed out that resistances are non-functioning.  Dang.  And I know
ygData.messageBody:
So, on looking over the new song descriptions at EQVault, saw how the author
continuously pointed out that resistances are non-functioning. Dang. And I
know I have seen the message, "you resist," and it certainly did seem like
the songs of resistance didn't do anything anyway (but to be honest I don't
see how I swing more often juggling Anthem and Whistling with a burst of
Bellow thrown in).

Fighting drakes, I always sung Elemental Rhythms, guess I was just wasting
my time. What a let-down, and I never would have noticed! Seemed like it
helped once in a while--probably just luck. A placebo song!

Roop
